name: A Hero's Burden
effect:
Pay 1 and name a class to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally of that class into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"We need to find the leader of these undead and kill him to ensure there's no one to push the wretches back upon us." - Moodle

name: A Proper String
effect:
On your turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Heroes and allies you control have Long-Range this turn.
"Slay a mature black dragon and remove the sinew from its bones. Return that sinew to me, and I shall enchant the material into an almost indestructuble bow string." - Stoma the Ancient

name: Adenda Lighthaven
effect: We must be prepared to ask of ourselves what we demand from others.

name: Akiko the Alert
effect: [Hunter] Pets you control have +2 / +2.
With her loyal protector, Fido, Akiko is a deadly ray of sunshine.

name: Alchemist Finklestein
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
1, Discard a Unique card > Draw a card.
"I assume by your interruption that you wish to be numbered among those I am considering for apprenticeship."

name: All Things in Good Time
effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
Pay 8 or discard an ability, ally, and equipment to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards.
"The scent of their burnt remains will linger in the air, reminding our enemy of their weakness." - Kilix the Unraveler

name: Arcane Binding
effect: Talent: Arcane

name: Arcane Essence
effect: Talent: Arcane

name: Arch Druid Lilliandra
effect: Talent: Balance
May Cenarius bless all those who defend Azeroth from the corruption of the Lich King.

name: Arctic Blast
effect: Talent: Frost
The Lich King isn't the only one who can command the powers of frost. - Randolphe Mortimer

name: Argent Confessor Paletress
effect: Talent: Discipline
In the face of despair and hatred, we must continue to stand true to our beliefs and fight on.

name: Army of the Damned
effect:
Scourge Hero Required
Name a Scourge ally. For each ally you control with that name, you may pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each 2 paid this way.
"You probably think you're quite strong - fighting these undead and crushing their bones beneath your war machines." - Matthias Lehner

name: Ashnaar, Frost Herald
effect: Your hero has Assault X, where X is this ally's ATK.
"Even in the darkest of times, I will do all that I can to aid those in need."

name: Askalti Darksteel
effect: Flip Askalti, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game ==> Target ally has +1 / -1 this turn.

name: Avalanche
effect:
When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.
When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon to a hero, your hero deals that much frost damage to target ally in that hero's party.
"Never in my life have I seen an arrow with such force, such raw power..." - Lelora Sunlancer

name: Azjol-anak Deathwatcher
effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your graveyard.

effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
At the start of your turn, discard a card.
The Skirmisher won't stop until it or its enemy is dead.

name: Babagahnoosh the Grumpy
effect: When this ally enters play, turn all resources you control face down and discard your hand.
"Out of my way - I have important matters to attend to!"

name: Banshee Soulclaimer
effect:
Scourge Hero Required
[Alliance] and [Horde] allies have -1 / -1.

name: Bath'rah the Windwatcher

"Joo gonna be a masta of da elements someday, dis I promise, mon."

name: Bestial Resurgence
effect: Talent: Beast Mastery
"If ya become one wit da beasts, then not even death can separate joo, bruddah." - The Longeye

name: Bitter Cold Armguards
effect: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally you control.
In these dire times, sacrifices must often be made for the greater good. - Saeryn Dusksorrow

name: Black Ice
effect: When you strike with this weapon on an opponent's turn, your hero may deal 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
"Alexstrazsa herself has bestowed this gift unto me, and I will not take it for granted." - Kana Nassis

name: Blessing of the Templar
effect: Talent: Holy
"Remain devout in your faith to the Light, and you too shall be rewarded." - Auryna the Lightsworn

name: Blood Lord Vorath
effect: Flip Vorath, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game ==> Vorath deals 1 shadow damage to target ally for each ally in its controller's graveyard.

name: Blood Plague
effect: Talent: Unholy
Your weakness will soon spread like a plague to all those who fight beside you. - Randolphe Mortimer

name: Bloody Slaughter
effect: Talent: Feral, Assassination
"Attacking unseen is not cowardice, but rather the height of wisdom." - Teina Cloudstalker

name: Boundless Concentration
effect: Talent: Beast Mastery, Arcane
"When you focus hard enough, you may find yourself able to cast a string of spells." - Archmage Barstow

name: Bradford the Frozen
effect: 1, Discard a [Mage] card with cost X ==> This ally deals X frost damage to target ally.

Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)

effect: Scourge heroes and allies have -2 ATK while in combat with this ally.

name: Butcher
effect: Talent: Assassination

As this weapon enters play, name two damage types.

effect: Talent: Combat

name: Cold Bones
effect:
Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)

Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. Target ally's damage type becomes [Frost] this turn.

effect: Ongoing: 1, [Activate] ==> Target ally you control has Protector this turn.

name: Cone of Cold
effect: Talent: Frost

name: Conqueror Tristos

Scourge Hero Required

effect:
Assault 1 (This ally has +1 ATK on your turn.)

effect: Talent: Demonology

name: Darktwister Kern
effect: You haven't truly mastered your craft if you have not learned the power that lies in the shadows.

name: Death Gate
effect: Talent: Unholy

When this ally enters play, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Unique Ghoul ally token named Brode into play exhausted with "This ally can't ready during its controller's ready step."

name: Desperate Plea

name: Divert

effect: Assault 4 (This ally has +4 ATK on your turn.)
